con:interface.name: Integration API
con:interface.con:description:
This is a sample definition of the Oracle WMS Cloud Integration API.
The views expressed here are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of Oracle.

con:part.con:content:
openapi: 3.0.0 info: version: "1.0" title: Integration API description: >- This is a sample definition of the Oracle WMS Cloud Integration API.
The views expressed here are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of Oracle. security: - basic: [] paths: /run_stage_interface/: post: description: '' summary: Run Stage Interface operationId: RunStageInterface responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: async: type: boolean company_code: type: string entity: type: string facility_code: type: string file_group_nbr: type: string required: - company_code - entity - facility_code - file_group_nbr /update_oblpn_tracing_nbr/: post: description: '' summary: Update OBLPN Tracking Number operationId: UpdateOBLPNTrackingNumber responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string dry_ice_weight: type: number estimated_delivery_time: type: string facility_code: type: string master_tracking_nbr: type: string oblpn_nbr: type: string rate: type: string ship_via_code: type: string tracking_nbr: type: string weight: type: number required: - company_code - facility_code - oblpn_nbr - tracking_nbr /run_mhe_stage_interface/: post: description: '' summary: Run MHE Stage Interface operationId: RunMHEStageInterface responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string entity: type: string facility_code: type: string mhe_vendor_code: type: string python_function: type: string required: - company_code - entity - facility_code - mhe_vendor_code /update_oblpn_dims/: post: description: '' summary: Update OBLPN Dimensions operationId: UpdateOBLPNDimensions responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: calc_vol_flg: type: boolean company_code: type: string facility_code: type: string height: type: number length: type: number oblpn_nbr: type: string ship_oblpn: type: boolean shipping_location: type: string volume: type: number weight: type: number width: type: number required: - calc_vol_flg - company_code - facility_code - height - length - oblpn_nbr - width /ship_oblpn: post: description: '' summary: Ship OBLPN operationId: ShipOBLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string facility_code: type: string locn_barcode: type: string oblpn_nbr: type: string output_file_to_generate: type: string required: - company_code - facility_code - locn_barcode - oblpn_nbr /init_stage_interface/: post: description: '' summary: Init Stage Interface operationId: InitStageInterface responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: async: type: boolean entity: type: string flat_data: type: string validate_xml: type: boolean xml_data: type: string /get_next_numbers/: post: description: '' summary: Get Next Numbers operationId: GetNextNumbers responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string counter_code: type: string count: type: integer facility_code: type: string required: - counter_code /get_status/: post: description: '' summary: Get Status operationId: GetStatus responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string entity: type: string facility_code: type: string key: type: string required: - entity - key /assign_oblpn_to_load/: post: description: '' summary: Assign OBLPN to Load operationId: AssignOBLPNtoLoad responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: carrier_code: type: string company_code: type: string delimiter: type: string facility_code: type: string load_nbr: type: string oblpn_nbr: type: string reassign_load_flg: type: boolean require_specific_oblpn_status: type: integer trailer_nbr: type: string required: - load_nbr - oblpn_nbr /create_lpn/: post: description: '' summary: Create LPN operationId: CreateLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: batch_number: type: string company_code: type: string dest_facility_code: type: string drop_locn_barcode: type: string expiry_date: type: string facility_code: type: string item_alternate_code: type: string item_barcode: type: string lock_code: type: string lpn_nbr: type: string lpn_weight: type: number order_type: type: string qty: type: integer xdock_lpn_flg: type: boolean required: - lpn_nbr - qty /receive_lpn/: post: description: '' summary: Receive LPN operationId: ReceiveLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string facility_code: type: string lpn_nbr: type: string rcvd_trailer_nbr: type: string received_ts: type: string receiving_location: type: string xdock_lpn_flg: type: boolean xml_data: type: string required: - lpn_nbr /lock_unlock_lpn/: post: description: '' summary: Lock/Unlock LPN operationId: Lock/UnlockLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: action: type: string company_code: type: string facility_code: type: string lock_code: type: string lpn_nbr: type: string remove_lock_from_shipment_dtl_flg: type: boolean /update_output_interface/: post: description: '' summary: Update Output Interface operationId: UpdateOutputInterface responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string cust_intl_code: type: string facility_code: type: string filename: type: string interface_type_code: type: string message: type: string run_output_interface_flg: type: boolean status_id: type: integer /induct_lpn/: post: description: '' summary: Induct LPN operationId: InductLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: flat_data: type: string xml_data: type: string /divert_confirm/: post: description: '' summary: Divert Confirm operationId: DivertConfirm responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: flat_data: type: string xml_data: type: string /pick_confirm/: post: description: '' summary: Pick Confirm operationId: PickConfirm responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: flat_data: type: string xml_data: type: string /extended_property/{entity_name}/{key}/{extended_property}: get: description: '' summary: Extended Property operationId: ExtendedProperty parameters: - name: entity_name in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: extended_property in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: key in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: company_code in: query required: false description: '' schema: type: string - name: facility_code in: query required: false description: '' schema: type: string responses: '200': description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' /assign_and_load_oblpn/: post: description: '' summary: Assign and Load LPN operationId: AssignandLoadLPN responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string dock_door_nbr: type: string facility_code: type: string load_nbr: type: string oblpn_nbr: type: string oblpn_weight: type: number pallet_nbr: type: string trailer_nbr: type: string required: - load_nbr - oblpn_nbr '/entity/{entity_name}/{key}/{sequence_number}/': patch: description: '' summary: Entity Update operationId: EntityUpdate parameters: - name: entity_name in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: key in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: sequence_number in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string responses: '200': description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' '/entity/{entity}/{key}/': get: description: '' summary: Object Inquiry operationId: ObjectInquiry parameters: - name: entity in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: key in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: company_code in: query required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: facility_code in: query required: true description: '' schema: type: string - name: minimize in: query required: false description: '' schema: type: string responses: '200': description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' /from_mhe_distribution_pack/: post: description: '' summary: From MHE Distribution Pack operationId: FromMHEDistributionPack responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: xml_data: type: string /from_mhe_distribution_short/: post: description: '' summary: From MHE Distribution Short operationId: FromMHEDistributionShort responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: flat_data: type: string xml_data: type: string /update_carrier_lpn_label/: post: description: '' summary: Update Carrier LPN Label operationId: UpdateCarrierLPNLabel responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: company_code: type: string facility_code: type: string label: type: string oblpn_nbr: type: string required: - label - oblpn_nbr '/entity/active_inventory/{location_barcode}/': patch: description: '' summary: Update Active Inventory operationId: UpdateActiveInventory parameters: - name: location_barcode in: path required: true description: '' schema: type: string responses: 200: description: '' content: application/xml: schema: type: object examples: response: value: '' requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: actual_qty: type: number adjustment_qty: type: number batch_number: type: string company_code: type: string expiry_data: type: string facility_code: type: string invn_attr_a: type: string invn_attr_b: type: string invn_attr_c: type: string invn_attr_d: type: string invn_attr_e: type: string invn_attr_f: type: string invn_attr_g: type: string item_alternate_code: type: string item_barcode: type: string item_code: type: string locn_capacity_check_flg: type: boolean reason_code: type: string required: - reason_code servers: - url: 'https://demo.wms.ocs.oraclecloud.com/demo_a9/wms/api' components: securitySchemes: basic: type: http scheme: basic
